Table S1: 
Reference genomes used in the current comparative analysis. Column A for species; column B with the species ID used in the manuscript and illustrations; column C for the species for which functional annotation (GO) was used; column E with the genome sizes; column F with the genome version used; column F with the link to the depository of the genomes used; column G with the publication references of the genomes used.
